trans-unit.source: provides all the required JDBC type conversions and additionally allows use of the individual setXXX methods for each type as if a setObject(Value, JDBCTypeCode) invocation were made.

trans-unit.source: This means that setString can be used for any built-in target type.

trans-unit.source: The setCursorName method can be used on a PreparedStatement prior to an execute request to control the cursor name used when the cursor is created.

seg-source.mrk: The setCursorName method can be used on a PreparedStatement prior to an execute request to control the cursor name used when the cursor is created.

target.mrk: The setCursorName method can be used on a PreparedStatement prior to an execute request to control the cursor name used when the cursor is created.
